Container.Name: unmove
Container.Overview:
File transfer application with TVDB integration for organizing media files. Identify TV series and movies, rename them properly, and move them to your media library.
This template uses a single /data mount for INSTANT file moves (no copy+delete). Your downloads and media folders should be subdirectories of the Data Path.
NOTE: Instant moves only work if downloads and media are on the SAME physical disk. If they are on different disks, the app will automatically fall back to copy+delete. To guarantee instant moves, mount a specific disk (e.g., /mnt/disk1) instead of /mnt/user.

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: Parent directory containing downloads and media folders. Using a single mount enables INSTANT file moves instead of copy+delete.

Config.Name: DOWNLOAD_PATH
Config.Description: Path to downloads folder inside container (relative to Data Path)

Config.Name: MEDIA_PATH
Config.Description: Path to media folder inside container (relative to Data Path)

Config.Name: TVDB API Key
Config.Description: Your TVDB API key (get one at https://thetvdb.com/api-information)

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (99 = nobody on Unraid)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (100 = users on Unraid)
